issue.title: How can i connect cpp files to srcsim simulation?

content.raw:
I made like this:

In /srcsim/ i made dir src and in it i crated two files -> /srcsim/src/talker.cpp and listener.cpp

Then i made a file CMakeLists.txt in /srcsim/ and copy-pasted the text from tutorial into it

And i ran the terminal and wrote: rosmake srcsim and it copiled the package with no fails , but when i type "rosrun srcsim talker" it can't find it:

[rosrun] Couldn't find executable named talker below /opt/ros/indigo/share/srcsim
